general_info.summary: This link leads to the Bachelor of Commerce (Honours) program page on the Sharda University website, likely providing details about the curriculum, admission criteria, faculty, and career prospects for this course.

career_path.summary: This program offers a career path in management with an average annual placement package ranging from 2.80 LPA to 3.00 LPA, encouraging students to take the next step in their professional development.
career_path.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 2.80 LPA to 3.00 LPA
Take the next step towards a career in management.
